about_the_game:
This is a demo of the original game 'Unresolved : The Vanquishers way'
A fierce dual blade and a strong will. How far will Ziel go in his search for the 'lifeStone' or will it remain unresolved.

Unresolved :The Vanquisher's way is a Hack-n-Slash Action-Adventure game. Ziel (the protagonist) his dual blade and a world full of challenges.How far will you go.



The world has mysteries of its own. How much can you see ?



Adversaries are tough..
... but so are you. Will you slay them all or fall prey

name: Unresolved: The slayer's quest Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: some system requirements might change in future.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: some system requirements might change in future.

short_description: Hack and slash action-adventure set in a mystical world, where there's a lot more to decipher than what it seems!
